sentences.en: The sorting algorithm runs in O(n log n) time complexity.
sentences.zh: 该排序算法的时间复杂度为 O(n log n)。

sentences.en: We need to optimize this algorithm for better performance.
sentences.zh: 我们需要优化这个算法以获得更好的性能。

sentences.en: Recursion is a method where the solution depends on solutions to smaller instances.
sentences.zh: 递归是一种方法，其解决方案依赖于较小实例的解决方案。

sentences.en: Be careful with recursion to avoid stack overflow.
sentences.zh: 使用递归时要小心避免栈溢出。

sentences.en: Encapsulation hides the internal state of an object from the outside.
sentences.zh: 封装将对象的内部状态对外部隐藏。

sentences.en: Good encapsulation leads to more maintainable code.
sentences.zh: 良好的封装能带来更易维护的代码。

sentences.en: Polymorphism allows objects of different classes to be treated as objects of a common superclass.
sentences.zh: 多态性允许不同类的对象被当作共同父类的对象来处理。

sentences.en: Method overriding is a common way to implement polymorphism.
sentences.zh: 方法重写是实现多态性的常见方式。

sentences.en: Inheritance enables new classes to receive the properties of existing classes.
sentences.zh: 继承使新类能够接收现有类的属性。

sentences.en: Multiple inheritance can lead to the diamond problem.
sentences.zh: 多重继承可能导致菱形继承问题。

sentences.en: Abstraction reduces complexity by hiding unnecessary details.
sentences.zh: 抽象通过隐藏不必要的细节来降低复杂性。

sentences.en: An abstract class cannot be instantiated directly.
sentences.zh: 抽象类不能被直接实例化。

sentences.en: Concurrency allows multiple tasks to run in overlapping time periods.
sentences.zh: 并发允许多个任务在重叠的时间段内运行。

sentences.en: Handling concurrency correctly is crucial for multi-threaded applications.
sentences.zh: 正确处理并发对多线程应用程序至关重要。

sentences.en: Serialization converts an object into a stream of bytes for storage.
sentences.zh: 序列化将对象转换为字节流以便存储。

sentences.en: JSON is a popular format for data serialization.
sentences.zh: JSON 是一种流行的数据序列化格式。

sentences.en: Asynchronous programming allows the program to continue executing while waiting for I/O.
sentences.zh: 异步编程允许程序在等待 I/O 时继续执行。

sentences.en: Use async/await syntax for cleaner asynchronous code.
sentences.zh: 使用 async/await 语法可以获得更简洁的异步代码。

meaning: adj. 已弃用的；不推荐的

sentences.en: This method is deprecated and will be removed in the next version.
sentences.zh: 此方法已弃用，将在下一版本中移除。

sentences.en: Avoid using deprecated APIs in new projects.
sentences.zh: 避免在新项目中使用已弃用的 API。
